short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A notepad to quickly store Magic The Gathering cards for deck building

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Built with the goal to make adding cards to your deck faster, without the need to constantly change tabs to copy-paste and do it all over again.

This extension is built for TappedOut.net in particular, but could be used anywhere that accepts purely card names. 

The only formatting applied to copied text is removing any information after/including any '{' characters. This feature is immplemented to help copy card names from websites like Scryfall that have icons denoting mana next to the names. For example, copying Counterspell {U}{U} would then be added as Counterspell.
